references.paper_title: Diffusion models beat gans on image synthesis
references.reason: This paper is foundational to the field of diffusion models and introduced a significant improvement over GANs in image generation, which directly influenced the work in text-to-video generation.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper advanced the state-of-the-art in high-resolution image generation with diffusion models, a key component of the text-to-video generation techniques discussed.

references.paper_title: Exploring the limits of transfer learning with a unified text-to-text transformer
references.reason: This work introduced the T5 text-to-text transformer model, a crucial part of the Open-Sora and On-device Sora architectures used for prompt embedding.

references.paper_title: Imagen video: High definition video generation with diffusion models
references.reason: This paper made a significant advancement in high-definition video generation using diffusion models, which is directly relevant to the goals and methods of the current research.

references.paper_title: Stable video diffusion: Scaling latent video diffusion models to large datasets
references.reason: This paper addresses the scaling challenges of video diffusion models to larger datasets, directly impacting the efficiency and quality of video generation, which are central concerns in the current research.
